This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a discounted rate, making it a great deal for you. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $135.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $135
